name: Clocktop's Crystal Conundrum
description:
This project is a demonstration of a few basic gameplay features, namely buttons and receptacles. 
In future projects, you will see Clocktop!
CONTROLS: WASD, Space (grab/drop) Q (throw), mouse to look

Note: Lighting is bugged, cry about it.

(plans are to build a simple dungeon generator using BSP, and this lil guy will be there! Stay tuned.)
